techmeme.title: Q&A with Ghostery CEO Jean-Paul Schmetz about the service turning 15, the state of ad tracking, why regulation is not the best path to protecting online privacy (Anthony Ha/TechCrunch)
How podcasting is turning into an industry of megastars with huge deals and the biggest audiences; Edison: the top 25 podcasts reach ~50% of US weekly listeners (Anne Steele/Wall Street Journal)
Sources: Apple plans to debut Apple Intelligence by October, a few weeks after iOS 18 and iPadOS 18 releases; devs get to test AI features as soon as this week (Mark Gurman/Bloomberg)
Dune Analytics: ~1.7M new digital coins entered circulation in H1 2024, compared with 264K in H1 2023, as the crypto market revival fuels a surge in memecoins (David Yaffe-Bellany/New York Times)
The US NIST re-releases Dioptra, an open-source web-based tool first unveiled in 2022 for benchmarking, testing, and assessing risks in AI models (Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch)
